nodes.text: Dust Juice was an alcoholic beverage that, despite having a disgusting taste, was allegedly the best of what a planet had to offer. After the hunt for Eeth Koth, a red-skinned Inquisitor and a Twi'lek Inquisitor drank the beverage to celebrate his death.
Dust Juice first appeared in Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 19, a 2018 canon comic written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
